hero.title: House of Pahlavi
hero.name: Parsis Foundation
hero.description: A foundation dedicated to advancing education, research, and technology for the benefit of the Persian diaspora and humanity.

home.intro: Parsis Foundation is a non-profit organization where programs focused on education, research, and innovation intertwine for the benefit of the Persian community and the world.
home.quote: Our future lies in unlocking the most precious resource of all—human potential.
home.legacyTitle: A Foundation Rooted in Persian Heritage
home.legacyText1: Parsis Foundation was established with a vision for the future development of the Persian diaspora, guided by the enduring values of the House of Pahlavi.
home.legacyText2: Across our ecosystem—supported by partnerships with leading international institutions—we are addressing pressing challenges, creating global impact, and empowering people to shape both the present and the future.
home.legacyQuote: We debate. We discover. We create. We curate. We think. We transform. And we do what we always did best—we unlock human potential.
home.valuesDescription: Excellence, integrity, and innovation form the foundation of everything we do. These values set the standards for our community and guide us in building a better future.
home.communityDesc: Deliver the exceptional to build a prosperous future for us all
home.generosityDesc: Take initiative, be curious, and explore beyond boundaries
home.inclusivityDesc: Be ethical, proactive, and dedicated in everything we do

biography.title: About
biography.headline: About Parsis Foundation
biography.subtitle: A foundation dedicated to education, research, innovation, and community development for the Persian diaspora and the world.
biography.earlyLifeText: Parsis Foundation is a not-for-profit organization where centers and programs focused on education, research, and technology intertwine for the benefit of the Persian community and the world.
biography.educationText: We support groundbreaking research in AI, cryptography, and decentralized systems. Our educational programs empower the next generation of leaders, researchers, and innovators.
biography.residenceText: Based in Switzerland with global partnerships, serving the Persian diaspora and contributing to international research and humanitarian efforts.
biography.artisticPracticeText1: Our research programs focus on frontier AI, applied cryptography, privacy-preserving computation, and decentralized systems that protect individual freedoms.
biography.artisticPracticeText2: We partner with leading universities and research institutions worldwide to advance knowledge and develop practical solutions for global challenges.
biography.exhibitionsSubtitle: Centers of excellence in education and research
biography.humanitarianText1: Our community programs connect the Persian diaspora worldwide, preserving cultural heritage while building bridges to the future.
biography.humanitarianText2: Educational initiatives support students and researchers, providing scholarships, fellowships, and resources for academic excellence.
biography.civicTechSubtitle: Programs supporting privacy technology, open governance, and decentralized infrastructure
biography.professionalText1: Parsis Foundation is led by experienced leaders from technology, finance, and academia, guided by the vision of the House of Pahlavi.
biography.professionalText2: HRH Cyrus Pahlavi serves as Chief Investment Officer, bringing expertise in privacy technology, applied cryptography, and strategic investment.

mission.title: Focus Areas
mission.headline: Advancing knowledge and innovation for humanity
mission.subtitle: Our programs span artificial intelligence, cryptography, open governance, education, and community development—all guided by our commitment to unlocking human potential.

sustainability.title: Artificial Intelligence Research
sustainability.description: We invest in frontier AI research, developing large language models, multimodal systems, and AI infrastructure that serves humanity. Our AI programs focus on responsible development and beneficial applications.
sustainability.quote: AI represents an unprecedented opportunity to unlock human potential. We are committed to ensuring this technology serves humanity.

coexistence.title: Cryptography & Privacy
coexistence.description: Our cryptography research advances privacy-preserving computation, zero-knowledge proofs, and secure communication systems. We develop tools that protect individual freedoms and enable trusted digital interactions.
coexistence.quote: Privacy is not just a right—it is the foundation of human dignity in the digital age.

education.title: Open Governance Protocols
education.description: We support research into decentralized governance, transparent decision-making systems, and protocols that enable communities to coordinate effectively without centralized control.
education.quote: Open governance empowers communities to shape their own future through transparent, participatory processes.

cooperation.title: Education & Scholarships
cooperation.description: Our educational programs support students and researchers worldwide, with a focus on STEM fields, leadership development, and interdisciplinary studies that prepare leaders for complex global challenges.
cooperation.quote: Education is the most powerful driver of progress. We invest in the leaders of tomorrow.

prosperity.title: Community Development
prosperity.description: We support programs that strengthen the Persian diaspora, preserve cultural heritage, and build connections across generations and borders.
prosperity.quote: Our community is our greatest strength. We nurture bonds that unite people worldwide.

identity.title: Humanitarian Programs
identity.description: We support humanitarian initiatives that protect human rights, assist refugees and displaced persons, and provide aid to communities in crisis.
identity.quote: We extend the hand of support to all who face hardship, standing in solidarity with those who need it most.
